Name: Swordia
About the game: A community driven an adventure MMORPG. We threw aside the traditional mmo and made it for gamers by gamers. In a world of chaos, it's your job as the player to thrive and free the world. The entire game is community based even the economy is player based. The God of Chaos is slowly consuming the world and as you do quests to defeat the God of Chaos more and more of the world will unlock before you eyes. Features Include: Community Polls for new game content weekly Player Based Economy Active Quests that Unlock the World when Completed
